sense.def:
To distinguish one thing from another
pomeni videti ali razumeti razliko med dvema stvarema.

seg.quote: He had never been capable of distinguishing between his friends and his enemies.

sense.def:
Če neka lastnost ali kakovost
distinguishes one thing from another
, povzroči, da za dve stvari priznamo, da sta različni.

seg.quote: What distinguishes totalitarian governments from authoritarian ones?
He had no scars or distinguishing marks.

sense.def:
To distinguish something
pomeni ravno še biti sposoben, da nekaj vidiš, slišiš ali okusiš.

seg.quote: The photograph was poor and few details could be distinguished.

sense.def:
To distinguish oneself
pomeni storiti nekaj takega, zaradi česar bomo slavni, pomembni ali občudovani.

seg.quote: ...prisoners who had distinguished themselves in battle.
